title: Impress the Sentinel Faction
description: You'll need Green Imaginite to enter Survival.
objective: Interact with the <font color='#FF7F00'>Battle Tower</font> to enter the <font color='#FF7F00'>Avant Gardens Survival</font> challenge, then <font color='#FF7F00'>last for 1 minute</font>. Survival requires 1 Green Imaginite.
